name: Video Breakdown
description: On-demand â€” not scheduled. Use as a template for analyzing a specific video.

payload.message:
Use yoinkit to break down this video: VIDEO_URL_HERE
1. Pull the content metadata (views, likes, publish date, channel info)
2. Pull the full transcript
3. Analyze the script structure: hook, intro, main points, CTA
4. What makes this video work? (pacing, topic angle, thumbnail strategy from title)
5. How could I cover this topic with my own angle?
